subject: Football
Relocation of Business
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. is returning to Los Angeles after 21 years, but on the day the hiatus began, when the Rams and the Raiders left town, nobody saw it coming.
snippet: The N.F.L. is returning to Los Angeles after 21 years, but on the day the hiatus began, when the Rams and the Raiders left town, nobody saw it coming.
